### **4 Do t-test**

* $H_0:\;\beta_0=0\;$ vs $\;H_1:\;\beta_0\neq 0$
* p-value = 0.409
* if p-value > $\alpha$, then we couldn't reject $H_0$. Hence we don't have enough information to say $\beta_0=0$

* if p-value < $\alpha$, then we reject $H_0$.Hence $\beta_0\neq0$
